channel.title: Toby Fox RADIO
channel.description: Toby Fox RADIO, TobyFox.co.uk's only radio channel! Featuring Toby Fox, some nifty sound effects and many themes varying from world tours to hits and even football! Download Toby Fox RADIO podcasts now!
channel.itunes:summary: Toby Fox RADIO is a series of many episodes by Toby fox, and airing on TobyFox.co.uk. Like Toby Fox TV, it is featured regularily across the site.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Toby Fox RADIO, the only radio channel on the whole of TobyFox.co.uk!
channel.copyright: Copyright 2012. All rights reserved, but if you ask me nicely, I may let you use my stuff for yourself.
channel.itunes:author: Toby Fox

item.title: Episode 16 (Toby Fox's Food Bites)
item.itunes:author: Toby Fox
item.dc:creator: Toby Fox
item.description: As promised in last weeks episode, Toby Fox's food bites is here, while I am in menorca. Me and my cousins prepare a selection of interesting and shocking food facts and stories, and serve them directly to you Toby Fox Radio listeners!
